topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Deploying the Role Generator Patches

body.p: After launching the hdeploy command, deploy two following patches to correct the following issues:

ul.li: The floating IP assigned to the lifecycle manager not pingable with DCNR3 and VSD managed networks.
The installation fails due to excessive ESX logs

ol.li: Download the fip_patch drectory and logrotate_patch directroy and the role-generator.py file. You should have downloaded these files in the prerequisites.
Copy the fip_patch drectory and logrotate_patch directroy and the role-generator.py file to the ~/<cloudname> directory on the KVM Host.

Execute the following commands to apply the patches:
cd ~/<cloudname> python role-generator.py /root/fip_patch/ apply <cloudname> python role-generator.py /root/logrotate_patch/ apply <cloudname>

body.p: Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
